name: Cheesy Taco Pasta
description: A quick, easy, filling weekday meal! While you cook the beef and dice the veggies, cook the pasta shells in the microwave–yes, the microwave! In a Multipurpose Steamer, add 2 cups dry pasta and 4 cups hot water. Cover; microwave on high until al dente, 10 min.

ingredients.name: lean ground beef, chicken or turkey

preparation: In a sauté pan over medium heat, brown beef for 8–10 min, stirring frequently. Drain excess fat.
Stir seasoning with water; add to pan. Add tomato, pepper, and broccoli. Simmer for 5 min, or until sauce is thickened.
Sit in pasta until evenly coated and warmed through, 1–2 min. Sprinkle with feta cheese, green onion, and salsa, if desired.
tips: Use extra-large shells and stuff them with the cheesy taco filling.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens and 1 tbsp Epicure salad dressing.
